Finally, a useful overview of historical developments in the major Seljuk centres of Bilad al-Sham at the time may be found in Taef Kamal El-Azhari’s The Saljuqs of Syria during the Crusades, while more information on Fatimid Egypt may be found in Michael Brett, The Fatimid Empire
